select a.no as cartNo, a.member_id as memberId, a.nonmember_mac as nonmemberMac, a.product_no as productNo, a.quantity as quantity, c.option_no as optionNo, c.no as optionDetailNo, d.name as optionName, c.value as optionValue, e.title as title, e.image as image, e.price as price, e.mileage_add as mileageAdd, e.shipping_price as shippingPrice from cart a join cart_product_option b on a.no = b.cart_no join product_option_detail c on b.product_option_detail_no = c.no join product_option d on c.option_no = d.no join product e on a.product_no = e.no where a.member_id=#{userid} or a.nonmember_mac=#{userid}
mapper.update: update cart set quantity=#{updateCount} where no=#{cartNo}
mapper.select: select a.no as optionNo, a.product_no as productNo, a.name as optionName, b.option_no as optionDetailNo, b.value as optionValue from product_option a join product_option_detail b on a.no = b.option_no where product_no=#{productNo}

select count(*) from product a join product_option b on a.no = b.product_no join product_option_detail c on b.no = c.option_no where a.no=(select product_no from cart where no=#{cartNo}) and
